EmailTemplate.description: Email letting customer know that they have incurred a $50 change fee
EmailTemplate.name: $50 Change Fee
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Review: Your application has incurred a change fee
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your change request has incurred a $50.00 fee. Please review your application and make payment by credit card (using the link below) or make a check payable out to the SFMTA.
{!Case.Link}
Thank you, San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
